meanings.definition: To exceed in quality or achievement.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork surpasses all others in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: His dedication to his craft surpasses that of his peers.
meanings.sent3: The race was so close that even a snail could surpass the competitors.
meanings.sent4: His kindness surpasses any language that words can express.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset surpasses any painting I have ever seen.

meanings.definition: To go beyond in amount or extent.
meanings.sent1: The number of attendees surpasses our expectations.
meanings.sent2: The river's depth surpasses the height of the bridge.
meanings.sent3: The amount of food on his plate surpasses his appetite.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter surpasses the sound of a thousand bells.
meanings.sent5: The speed of the car surpasses the limits of safety.
